snippet.title: Your first steps in MUME
snippet.description:
MUME is a text-based role-playing game set in Tolkien's Middle-earth.

In this video intended for beginners, you'll learn:
- How to create a character.
- MUD basics (rooms, objects, and characters).
- About the war between the Free People and Sauron's minions.
- How to get around and make money in the Blue Mountains (the Dwarven city).
- About mappers (tools that show a graphical map of your whereabouts).
- How to survive unexpected encounters (flee, wimpy setting).
- How to build your character (learning skills, selecting and acquiring equipment).
- About secret exits and other clues revealed by the descriptions.
- About renting to preserve your character between playing sessions.
- About combat and how to group to progress faster.
- How large the MUME world is.
